content.description:
This climbs a good, little roof in this area. I called it Salt, I'm sure it's been done before.

 Beta: Start with your right hand on an incut crimp and your left hand on a slightly worse sidepull. Move your left hand to the lip, change your feet, and bump to a jug. Top out.
content.location: It climbs an obvious, short, 70 degree roof in this area.

content.description: Start to the down and to the right of the crack, and use the obvious hand holds to get your left hand into the crack. Get a high foot, and push yourself up to a right hand on the overhang.
content.protection: Pads. Be mindful of the jagged rocks below.

climbs.name: Certain Fate
climbs.fa: Some dude in the 90s wearing neon pink lycra

content.description:
Squat start on two edges just left of the "Revolver Reach" crack, and head left up to the overhang. To top out, go up the left face of the overhanging block.

 This is one of the better lines I've come across in the Fells. I built up the landing, so it isn't as horrible.
content.protection: It has kind of a funky landing. I'd say at least two pads and a spotter to be safe.

content.description: A cluster of large rocks, one with a nice face with 2 or more routes. A large overhang sticks out from the top.
